name: RAID 51 (Jakub Kozelka, CubaisSVK)
description:
That day has finally come! Your theories will be confirmed soon enough.

You've been waiting for this chance your whole life! Your goal is within reach - just a few hundred meters away lies the truth. However, you are not the only one who wants to confirm the existence of aliens.

However, you are determined to be the first one to do that. Therefore, fight your way through hordes of journalists, reporters, conspirators, soldiers, and others who will stand in your way. Be the first to get to the truth. Be the first to discover the secret of Area 51.
